section.title: Software required for core DITA-OT processing
section.p:
DITA-OT requires the following software applications:
Java Development Kit (JDK) or Java Runtime Environment (JRE)
This is the only prerequisite that you need to install. All other required software is provided in the distribution package, including
, Saxon , and ICU for Java .

section.title: Software required for specific transformations
section.p:
Depending on the type of output that you want to generate, you might need the following applications:
HTML Help Workshop Microsoft no longer provides the software required for generating Compiled HTML Help (.chm) files. You can download an archived copy of the HTML Help Workshop from the Internet Archiveâ€™s Wayback Machine at .
XSL-FO processor Required for generating PDF output. (Formatting Objects Processor) is included in the distribution package. You can download other versions from . You can also use commercial FO processors such as Antenna House Formatter or RenderX XEP.
